Ever wondered how your voice could make you money while you sleep? Here's a secret: AI voiceover gigs are booming! Companies are constantly seeking unique voices for their AI systems and animations, and they're willing to pay top dollar for them. The tool you need? Descript's Overdub feature. It's a game-changer, allowing you to clone your voice digitally. With Overdub, you can create voiceovers for videos, podcasts, and even audiobooks without ever hitting record again. Hereâ€™s the kicker: you can sell these services on platforms like Fiverr or Upwork. Imagine earning from projects globally, all because your digital voice is working 24/7. Start by recording a few samples, set up your gig, and watch as your voice brings in passive income. Voice your way to profit, literally!
